Bolton (1945-1984) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi.
A mụrụ Bolton na Jenụwarị 9, 1945 na Lexington, Georgia. Ọ gàrà Mahadum Georgia dị na Athens wee nweta PhD ya
O gosipụtara nka ya na High Museum of Art na Atlanta. Ọrụ ya dị na Museum of Contemporary Art of Georgia. Ihe osise ya nke 1971 The World Outside dị na Georgia's State Art Collection.
Bolton nwụrụ n'August 10, 1984 na Pensacola, Florida. Ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ ya dị na faịlụ Art & Artist na Smithsonian American Art Museum.
